ITEM.NAME: Tortellini
ITEM.DESC_MATERIAL: pork, mortadella, ham, eggs, parmisan, flour 00
ITEM.DESC_PREPARATION: Mix pork, ham, mortadella, parmisan and eggs; rest for 20 hours. Shape 4x4xcm squares with filling; fold them.
ITEM.DESC_COOKING: Boil them briefly, not too long time.
ITEM.DESC_SERVING: Also in brodo a few of parmisan leaves a great tast.

ITEM.NAME: Lasagna
ITEM.DESC_PREPARATION: Flatten the roll of pasta. Cut the roll in 10x15cm strips.
ITEM.DESC_COOKING: Boil the strips of pasta till they pop up on the top; wash and dry. Put them on backing tin covering with ragù and bechamel sause; cover with the next strip, etc.
ITEM.DESC_SERVING: Serve with a few of parmisan that leaves a great tast.

ITEM.NAME: Tagliatelle
ITEM.DESC_PREPARATION: Roll the pastry not too tight and then flatten the roll. Cut the roll in 8mm strips; dry them for a few hours.
ITEM.DESC_COOKING: While finishing cooking the bolognese ragù boil the pasta, not too long time.
ITEM.DESC_SERVING: Serve the pasta, with a few ragù and parmisan on the top.

ITEM.NAME: Salumi and cheese plate
ITEM.DESC_PREPARATION: Cut salami, then the mortadella and ham preferebly by a professional cutter.
ITEM.DESC_COOKING: Slice the salami at your pleasure.
ITEM.DESC_SERVING: Serve with a few of parmisan and pecorino on a side.

ITEM.NAME: Spuma di mortadella
ITEM.DESC_PREPARATION: Finely mince the mortadella; mix with ricotta, cream and parmesan.
ITEM.DESC_SERVING: Serve on a toast with an olive on the top.

ITEM.NAME: Friggione
ITEM.DESC_PREPARATION: Smoothly cut the honions and leve them rest with salt and sugar; for 2 hours.
ITEM.DESC_COOKING: Add chopped tomatoes and coook in a pan till sauce is tasty
ITEM.DESC_SERVING: Serve with meat or fish, friggione is always great.

ITEM.NAME: Rise cake
ITEM.DESC_MATERIAL: milk, rise, sugar, eggs, candies. almond liqueur
ITEM.DESC_PREPARATION: Beat the eggs with sugar, candies and liqueur
ITEM.DESC_COOKING: Boil the milk and rise with grated lemon, salt and sugar. Cook everything in backing tin.
ITEM.DESC_SERVING: Golen and crisp server with some vanilla sugar on the top.
